name: Helluva.docx
description:
Your last project before getting promoted to heaven, so no mistakes must be made. You have to submit your project to Lucifer before the deadline gets you, however the way through the hellish office is not easy!

The "Hell" Corporation's office has always been known for being chaotic. Navigate your way through confusing corridors, long ladders, annoying coworkers and sharp thorns. Oh and don't forget to use your dash ability. 

The default controls are : 
AD - to Move left and right

Space bar to Jump 

F to Interact 

Left mouse button to Dash 

Right mouse button to Hold On to the ladder

However, all of the controls are customizable in the controls section of the menu. 

This game was made by me as a coder and my friend as an artist for the NSPM IT challenge.  All of the code and art was made by us. 

Background music : Kira's Theme by JoRoYT

Tips : 

- Look above before jumping, the ceiling thorns are waiting for your demise. 

- Don't forget to grab the ladder tightly or else you'll fall to death. 

- The coworker side-quests are optional. 

Install instructions : 

1) Unzip the file. 

2) Open "Helluva.docx.exe"

3) Enjoy!
